scripts.migrate:categories: tsc --project tsconfig.script.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.script.json && FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_PATH="./serviceAccountKey.json" node dist/scripts/migrate-categories.js
scripts.collect-feeds: tsc --project tsconfig.script.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.script.json && FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_PATH="./serviceAccountKey.json" AI_SUMMARIZER_PROVIDER="OLLAMA" OLLAMA_MODEL_NAME="exaone3.5:2.4b" node dist/scripts/crawl-and-summarize.js
scripts.list-gemini-models: tsc --project tsconfig.script.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.script.json && node dist/scripts/list-gemini-models.js
scripts.generate-trend-report: tsc --project tsconfig.script.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.script.json && FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_PATH="./serviceAccountKey.json" AI_SUMMARIZER_PROVIDER="OLLAMA" OLLAMA_MODEL_NAME="exaone3.5:2.4b" node dist/scripts/generate-trend-report.js
